Interface IRecordingListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IStreamListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecordingListener

    public interface IRecordingListener
extends IStreamListener
    Recording listener interface.
    Author:
    Paul Gregoire (mondain@gmail.com)
